configuration.name: preprocessScript
script
script
configuration.value:
# You must supply a Content-Type: application/json header in PUT and POST requests
# You must set an Accept: application/json header on all requests
# todo state deprecated?
global sdc, state

try:
    sdc.importLock()
    from string import Template
finally:
    sdc.importUnlock()


for record in sdc.records:
    ticket = Template(state['TEMPLATE']).safe_substitute(record['variables'])

    new_record = sdc.createRecord('Anodot alert')
    new_record.value = ticket
    try:
        sdc.log.info("Output record: " + str(new_record.value))
        sdc.output.write(new_record)
    except Exception as e:
        sdc.error.write(new_record, str(e))

uiInfo.label: Stats Aggregator -Write Directly to Control Hub - statistics are not aggregated across Data Collectors
